question: Claire has 10 jars of frosting in her cupboard. Each jar of frosting can decorate 6 cupcakes. Claire wants to bake enough cupcakes to use up all of her frosting. If each pan holds 20 cupcakes, how many pans worth of cupcakes should she bake?
answer:
She has enough frosting for 10 * 6 = <<10*6=60>>60 cupcakes.
She needs 60 / 20 = <<60/20=3>>3 pans to bake all of the cupcakes.
#### 3
